alert.note: Alert for Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 6:13PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Dubuque County through 700 PM CDT... At 613 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cascade, or 15 miles southwest of Dubuque, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Asbury, Cascade, Epworth, Farley, Peosta, Rickardsville, Centralia, Sageville, Bankston, Durango, Graf, Bankston Park, Fillmore, Cottage Hill, Fillmore Recreation Area, Lattnerville, Five Points, East Rickardsville, and Dubuque County Fairgrounds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
